thread.title: Lamar Odom Reportedly Fighting For His Life After Being Found Unconscious in a Brothel
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom Reportedly Fighting For His Life After Being Found Unconscious in a Brothel

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Lamar Odom Reportedly Fighting For His Life After Being Found Unconscious in a Brothel
text:
Share Tweet Pin E-mail Getty ​TMZ reports Lamar Odom, former NBA star and ex-husband of Khloé Kardashian, was hospitalized after he was discovered unconscious in a brothel in Nevada.
Sources told TMZ Lamar was staying at Dennis Hof's Love Ranch South in Pahrump, Nevada where he was reportedly partying with women at the brothel for days. Hof told TMZ Lamar was staying alone in a VIP suite at the ranch. On Tuesday afternoon, a woman came into his room and found him unconscious, Hof told the site. The woman screamed for a manager, who then called for an ambulance.
More From Cosmopolitan Lamar reportedly had ​a "mucus-type liquid coming out of his nose and mouth" at the scene. He was taken to a hospital in Pahrump where he was intubated, sources told TMZ. ​ ​He is expected to be airlifted to Las Vegas soon. TMZ reports the prognosis for Lamar at this time is "not good."
Khloé and Lamar finalized their divorce in July and since then, tensions have seemed to run high between the couple. ​ Lamar has been in the headlines in past months, most recently for having a heated exchange in public with his ex-wife . In June, Lamar's close friend ​Jamie Sangouthai ​ ​ died of a disease related to his drug abuse . ​
This story will be updated as more information becomes available.
​ Follow Rebecca on Instagram .
